bodhiropanayada puda salakili mada itha u්karshawath lesa pawathwuha.bodin wahanse wadama kala nawe kumbaa gaha saghamith theraniya wada siti mehewarehi ek geyakada palupatha thawath geyaka kenipathaya thawath geyakada mahajanayata dakabala ganimata thanpath karana ladi.budusasuna lakdiwa mulwasa ganime aramuna athiwa dewanampiyathissa rajuge dayakathwayen sidu wu winaya sanghayanawata bhikshun wahansela sata ata dahasak ras wu bawada aithihasika mulashrayawala sadahan weyi.mita amatharawa ohu wasarak thuladi karana lada wehera wihara ha wenath aagamika godanagili athara isurumuniya wihiraya,shaththalhaka mehenawara,mahapali danhala,nagadipaye dambaakola wehera ha thissa mahawiharaya,prachinaramaya aadiya dakwiya hakiya.lekhana kalawa,gruha nirimana shilpaya,murthi shilpaya,katayam kalawa,chithra shilpaya aadi gala shilpawalin shri lanka shishtacharaya opawath wuye mahindagamanayen pasuwaya.danata mehi noyek sthanawalin hamuwi athi purwa brahmi shila lekhanawalin paranima eewa ayath wanne kri.pu.thunwana siyawasataya.mewayehi athi akshara indiyawe ashoka shila lekhanawala aksharawalata samanaya.
